title: Executive Order 6037-Authorizing the Appointment of Miss Alice Mummenhoff
content: Miss Alice Mummenhoff, who, since March 5, 1923, has been serving in a position in the Post Office Department excepted from civil-service requirements, may be appointed in the classified service without compliance with civil-service rules.
This order is issued upon the recommendation of the Postmaster General.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 6037-Authorizing the Appointment of Miss Alice Mummenhoff Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361587
